sources.name: Movies
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Movies

sinks.name: Output
sinks.script:
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Output

transformations.name: MoviesYear
transformations.script:
Movies derive(year = toInteger(trim(right(title, 6), '()')),
		title = toString(left(title, length(title)-6))) ~> MoviesYear
